introduction: Based on the award-winning book series by Anna Dewdney, Llama Llama is known for its emotive content, signature characters, family relationships, and addressing the everyday issues of young children. Llama Llama is the story about the challenges of growing up. Whether learning how to be brave in the dark, battling shopping boredom, braving his first day of preschool, or waiting patiently for Christmas Day, Llama Llama can always rely on Mama for her love and guidance. Starring Jennifer Garner as the voice of Mama Llama and produced by Jane Startz.
